column1: #Text=In many Eastern philosophies , it has been said that the cause of suffering in human beings is the Ego , also known as Ahamkara , Identity , character , etc.
#Text=Desire and resistance are opposite forms of attachment , and the misperception of our true nature is connected to " feeling like a self .

#Text=By actively engaging in this practice you will end  feeling like a self " and asmita will leave your experience .

column1: #Text=This is known as " coalescence , " or a glittery shimmering purification of your consciousness that develops in pervading throughout all things , dissolving differentiation .
#Text=Practice makes practice ! And the harder you try , the harder you will get better at it .
#Text=This is cited in many research articles and scholarly texts !
#Text=You are more likely to stop feeling like a self if you surround yourself with a community of people who are also actively working towards not feeling like a self !
#Text=You are also more likely to enjoy your experience on Earth , as feeling like a Self is said to be the root of all suffering .
